title: I love the winter weather...NOT
body:
Just a reminder to check our website, call our movie line, or look at your Facebook or Twitter feeds for news of any film cancellations. We rarely do this, but it seems every January we have to cut out a show or two due to ice and snow.

So, tonight ME AND ORSON WELLES at 9pm and A SINGLE MAN at 9:15pm are CANCELED. The early shows (ORSON WELLES @ 6:30p & YOUNG VICTORIA @ 6:45p are still being shown).

Thank you for understanding!
author: Nicole
